set.name: DM24-BD2 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Johnny

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Each of your other Jokers get +4000 power. ■ This creature can attack your opponent the turn it is put. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 5 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose a civilization. Your opponent can't cast spells that have that civilization during this turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD2 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Johnny

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dragon/Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may return any number of your Jokers in the battle zone to your hand. For each Jokers returned this way, this creature costs 1 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card, then, discard a card from your hand. ■ Joragon Big 1 Whenever you discard a Jokers from your hand, you may use one of its abilities that start with "When you put this creature".

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Master Dragon Card

property.name: Name1
property.value: King the Slotton 7

property.name: Name2
property.value: Seventh Seven

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If all 3 cards are Jokers, put a creature from among them. During that turn, that creature can attack your opponent. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent reveals the top 3 cards of their deck, and you choose one from among them. Your opponent puts each of their creatures that cost the same as the chosen card and the 3 revealed cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 2 less to summon for each civilization in your opponent’s mana zone. ■ This creature can attack your opponent the turn it is put. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 5 or more Jokers in your mana zone and/or battle zone, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone of each civilization. Your opponent puts those cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

If you discarded a Jokers, you may use one of its abilities that start with "When you put this creature". ■ Your opponent can only cast 1 spell during their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, choose a player. That player shuffles all cards in their graveyard into their deck. ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent puts a creature for no cost, put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD2 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Johnny

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 7 or more Jokers in your mana zone and/or battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Choose a card that costs 3 or less and put it on the bottom of it’s owner’s deck. ► One of your creatures can attack your opponent until the end of the turn. ► Choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Ignore that creature’s effects until the end of the turn.

Then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost. If it's your opponent's turn, and you have had 2 or more of your shields broken this turn, this creature gets its Shield Trigger Plus ability.) {SHIELD TRIGGER PLUS}: When you put this creature, players can't lose the game this turn. ■ When you put this creature, if you have a total of 3 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's elements that costs 3 or less and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less and put it on the bottom of their deck. {SUPER}: All creatures can't attack this turn.
